CONTENT: ダメねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm just awful.

CONTENT: あっ やっ... でも 一応 最後まで弾けて...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al menos tocaste hasta el fi...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh... But you at least managed to play it to the enー

CONTENT: そこなんだけどね!　は... はい

CONTENT: 考えてみたら 私 ボーカルもやるわけじゃない?

CONTENT: でも 今は 全神経 ギターに行っちゃって　歌どころじゃなくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero no puedo cantar si me concentro en la guitarra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But I can't sing while I'm focusing all my motor control on the guitar.

CONTENT: な... なるほど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I... I see...

CONTENT: もういっそ ボーカルだけのほうが　バンドのためなんじゃないかと 思ったんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No sería mejor que me limitara a cantar?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was thinking it might be better for the band if I just sang...

CONTENT: でも 間奏中とか やることなくて 私 オロオロしちゃいそうだし...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque no sabría qué hacer en las partes instrumentales.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But then I wouldn't have anything to do during interludes, and I'd probably start fidgeting on stage...

CONTENT: あっ えっと... イエイ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, um... Yeah!

CONTENT: だから... あっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So...

CONTENT: もっと頑張らないとね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess I'd better work harder!

CONTENT: キターン!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kit-aura!

CONTENT: 目が! え?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My eyes!

CONTENT: い... いえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: N-Nothing.

CONTENT: 爽やか向上心パワー まぶしすぎる!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Su deseo de mejorar es cegador.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Her eager self-improvement power is too bright to look directly at!

CONTENT: そういえば 私がボーカルやってもいいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But are you sure it's all right for me to sing?

CONTENT: そうだ 後藤さんも一緒に歌って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I know! You should sing with me!

CONTENT: むっ むむむむ... 無理です 絶対!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: N-N-Not happening!

CONTENT: え? でも... むむむむ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: B-But...

CONTENT: ごめんなさい そんな嫌なのね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sorry. Is it that unpleasant a thought?

CONTENT: いいね それ ん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, nice one.

CONTENT: 新しいギターパフォーマンス?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is that some new guitar showmanship move?

CONTENT: 先輩! これ好きですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Senpai! Do you like it?

CONTENT: じゃあ 私も練習を
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then I'll practice it too!

CONTENT: しなくていい そんな練習
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't need to practice that.

CONTENT: リョウも来たし 向こうに集合ね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ryo ya está aquí, así que reunámonos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ryo's here, so let's meet up at the club!

CONTENT: はい! むむむむ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right!

CONTENT: それでは バンドミーティングを始めます　拍手!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We will now begin the band meeting! Round of applause!

CONTENT: さて 本日のお題は こちら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Este es el tema de hoy.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, here's today's topic!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The question: How can we be more band-like?

CONTENT: ざっくりしている!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's so half-assed!

CONTENT: せっかく メンバーも集まったんだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now that we've got a full member lineup,

CONTENT: まずは4人で より一層 バンドらしくなっていきたいなと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero que nos afiancemos más como banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I figured the first order of business was to get us acting more band-like!

CONTENT: な... なるほど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I... I see!

CONTENT: いや 練習あるのみなのは 分かってるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sé que ensayar es lo mejor,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I know practice is crucial,

CONTENT: だけど そればっかりだとね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but there's gotta be more to us than that!

CONTENT: いろいろ話したりするのも 大事かなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think we should talk about all kinds of stuff!

CONTENT: もしかして 虹夏ちゃん　最近 練習 頑張ってる 喜多さんの息抜きに?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Acaso lo propone para que Kita descanse un poco?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is she trying to give Kita-san a break from all her practice?

CONTENT: まずは形から入ってみるのも ありでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: One tactic is to nail the superficial stuff first!

CONTENT: ありですね!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, that totally works!

CONTENT: はやってるメイクとかも　まねしてるうちに 様になってくるというか

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like if you start imitating a new popular make-up technique and end up looking great!

CONTENT: そうそう!　どうしよう 全然ピンとこない

CONTENT: というわけで...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And with that in mind...

CONTENT: とりあえず バンドグッズ作ってきた!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I made us band merch!

CONTENT: 予想以上に形から入ってきた!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's a more superficial starting point than I expected!

CONTENT: それ ただ 結束バンド巻いてるだけじゃ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo es una cinta de plástico.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you just put a zip tie around your wrist?

CONTENT: えっ かわいくない? いろんな色あるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Cute, huh? They come in all colors!

CONTENT: 物販で500円で売ろう　ぼったくり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We'll sell them for 500 yen a piece. What a ripoff!

CONTENT: サイン付きは650円で　安い! 買います!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: 650 if they're signed. What a steal! I'll take one!

CONTENT: それじゃ バンド内で お金が循環するだけでは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El dinero solo circulará dentro de la banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Won't that just be circulating money within the band?

CONTENT: ほかにバンドらしくなるアイデア ある人ー

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyone else with ideas for becoming more band-like?

CONTENT: いいねえ! SNS大臣 任命します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Great idea! I hereby appoint you Minister of Social Media!

CONTENT: そのときが来たら 毎日 更新しますね

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I'll post every day when the time comes!

CONTENT: あとはー ファンクラブの設立?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And... What about forming a fan club?

CONTENT: すごく気が早い!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's awfully hasty!

CONTENT: 年会費は1万円　そして高い!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: 10,000 yen annual membership fee. That's awfully expensive!

CONTENT: ファンクラブ 会員特典として

CONTENT: 握手会と 年に1度　メンバーとの たこ焼きパーティを...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: serán un fanmeet y una fiesta de takoyaki al año.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and a once-a-year takoyaki party with the band.

CONTENT: 材料はファン持ちで　安い! 入ります!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The fans bring the ingredients. What a steal! I'll join!

CONTENT: 喜多ちゃんもメンバーだからね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kita-chan, you're already in the band.

CONTENT: 後藤さんは? えっ?　何かアイデアある?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about you, Gotoh-san? Any ideas?

CONTENT: どうしよ 何も考えてなかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What do I do? I wasn't even thinking!
W-Well...

CONTENT: な... なんか 目がキラキラしてる!　期待の目をされてるー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Le brillan los ojitos. Espera algo de mí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: H-Her eyes are so sparkly! I feel the burden of expectation!

CONTENT: えっと えーっと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Um...

CONTENT: な... なんか言わなきゃ　なんか なんか... わああー 何も浮かばない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo que decir algo. ¡No se me ocurre nada!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-If I don't say something, I... I... Nothing's coming to mind!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What do I... What do I...

CONTENT: ぼっちちゃんには オリジナルソングの作詞という　重要任務があるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ella tiene la misión de escribir la letra de nuestra canción.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She has a more important job: writing lyrics for our original song!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We settled on it before, remember? Ryo would write the music, and you'd write the lyrics!

CONTENT: 歌詞に禁句が多いなら ぼっちちゃんが書けばいいよ　書けばいいよ　書けばいいよ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y tú la letra para así no incluir tus palabras tabú.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you've got off-limits words, Bocchi-chan, you should write the lyrics! write the lyrics!
write the lyrics!

CONTENT: えーっ! リョウ先輩の曲 楽しみです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me muero por oír tu canción.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wow! I can't wait to hear your song, Ryo-senpai.

CONTENT: もう作ってたりするんですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Have you written it already?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No. La haré cuando me llegue la inspiración.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No. I'll do it once I get inspiration.

CONTENT: わあー 楽しみ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just can't wait!

CONTENT: 頼むよ リョウ　それと作詞大臣
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go for it, Ryo! And Minister of Lyrics!

CONTENT: は... はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: R-Right...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san, it's so cool that you took on such a tough job!

CONTENT: か... かっこいい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Cool?!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, escribir letras es pan comido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: W-Well, I can write lyrics like nobody's business! It's the super-easiest thing ever!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You get carried away so easily, Gotoh-san.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm gonna write the most band-like lyrics and guarantee us a huge hit!
\"Band-like\"?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I couldn't think of anything!

昨日も現実逃避して 動画 5時間も編集してしまったし

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I already spent five hours yesterday editing video to escape reality.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Done. I'm so stupid! I'm a paramecium!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whatcha writin'? No!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A curse?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's get organized.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kita-san's gonna be singing this song.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Cheerful lyrics. A seishun song, maybe?

CONTENT: キターン
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kit-aura!

CONTENT: 暗い歌詞だったら いくらでも書けるけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I could easily write depressing lyrics, of course...

CONTENT: キターン!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Kit-aura!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso no es lo que quieren.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nobody wants that,

CONTENT: キターンとした バンドっぽいのを
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ha de ser una letra radiante.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so I've gotta write something band-like, with real Kit-aura!

CONTENT: 明るい人間になりきるんだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Put yourself in the mind of cheery person!

CONTENT: 私は陽キャ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm an extrovert!

CONTENT: ナイトプールでサーフィンする女!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una mujer que surfea en la piscina nocturna.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The woman who surfs in the pool at night!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Una mujer con el título de Queen of Wei.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The woman who claims the title Queen of Woot!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Woot! Woot! Woot! Woot! Go! Go!

CONTENT: バイブス上げてこーっ! おにいさん テキーラ追加ー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's get some vibes up in here! Tequila shots in the house!

CONTENT: って 違う!　これは明るい人じゃなくて ただのパリピだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡No! Eso es ser fiestera, no extrovertida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No! That's not a cheery person, it's just a party animal!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esto no sirve. Me convertiré en Kita.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No more shortcuts. You must become Kita-san.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Síganme los que quieran ir a Shibuya!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come over now if you wanna go to Shibuya!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es un sitio perfecto para Insta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Everyone takes Isstaworthy pics right here!

CONTENT: あと10分後に 花火が打ち上がるから　みんなで写真を撮ろ...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They'll be launching fireworks in ten mins, so let's take pictures together then!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I know an exorcist, if you need one...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's n-n-n-not like that!

CONTENT: 青春ソングは やめだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, no seishun songs.

CONTENT: 応援ソングにしよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's try a song of encouragement.

CONTENT: 本当は 無責任に現状を肯定する歌詞は　あまり好きじゃないんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Odio las letras que refuerzan el statu quo, pero bueno.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I personally find status-quo-affirming lyrics annoyingly irresponsible, but...

CONTENT: 薄っぺらい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's so shallow...

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si oyera una canción así estando deprimida, empeoraría.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Any depressed person hearing this song would just drop deeper into despair!

CONTENT: ゆゆゆ... 許してください!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: F-F-Forgive me!

CONTENT: 後藤さん? えっ なになに どうした?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san? What's the matter now?

CONTENT: ちょ... 調子に乗ったくせに 全然 歌詞書き上げてこない私を　呼び出して つるし上げる会では?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No me llamaron para ahorcarme por vanagloriarme y no acabar la letra?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-Isn't this an intervention where you tear into me for failing to write lyrics despite all the bragging I did?

CONTENT: そんな外道なことしないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's perverse! No way!

CONTENT: じゃあ 今日 集まったのは...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then why did you call us here?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El otro día no se me ocurrió, pero hay otra cosa típica de una banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I didn't think of it until now, but there's one other really band-like thing we can do!

CONTENT: アー写を撮ろう!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Take ProPhos!

CONTENT: アーティスト写真だって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Promotional photos, she means.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Since Bocchi-chan isn't in Kessoku Band's current ProPho.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: C-Current?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quieres verla? La tomamos antes del concierto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Want to see? We took it for our last concert.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, since Kita-chan ditched us... I'm sorry!

CONTENT: こんなひどいアー写 初めて見た
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca he visto una foto tan mala.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've never seen such an awful ProPho.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hoy hace buen tiempo y podíamos coincidir todas,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, because it's nice out today and none of us have plans,

CONTENT: アー写 撮っちゃおうかなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I figured we'd take a few ProPhos!

CONTENT: えっ! そ... 外でですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: O-Outside?!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No tenemos dinero para ir a un estudio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We don't have the money to rent a studio, so...

CONTENT: 下北の街なかで写真 撮るなんて　陰キャにはハードル高すぎる!

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Taking public pictures in Shimo-Kita is too much to ask of a nerd like me!

CONTENT: まあ 外じゃなくて STARRYでもいいんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We could do it in Starry instead if you prefer,

CONTENT: アー写って バンドの方向性とか メンバーの特徴を　1枚で伝える 大切なものだからさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero en la FdA se expresan la dirección y las características de la banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but a ProPho is important for conveying a band's direction and the unique qualities of its members.

CONTENT: じゃあ 気合い入れて撮らないとですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So we really need to give it everything we have?

CONTENT: そのとおり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Precisely!

CONTENT: ライブハウスのサイト告知や フライヤーや雑誌

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No mucho, pero si pienso en la banda...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not sure I agree, but for the band's sake...

CONTENT: あっ はい 傑作です
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, it's a masterpiece.

CONTENT: 個人的に このサインは　ロックバンドにしては 子供っぽい気がする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La del centro me parece de niña, no de banda de rock.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Though personally I think one is a bit childish for a band.

CONTENT: そのページじゃないです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's not the right page!

CONTENT: ぼっち的には この歌詞で満足?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you personally satisfied with these lyrics, Bocchi?

CONTENT: えっ あっ え... それは　ヒットしたバンドらしいのが いいのかなーと...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Supuse que quedaría bien si era como la de una banda exitosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, w-well... I figured we should do something really \"hit band\"-like...

CONTENT: 言ったっけ?　私 昔は 別のバンドにいたんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Te lo había dicho? Ya estuve en otra banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did I ever tell you? I was in another band a long time ago.

CONTENT: そのバンドの青臭いけど まっすぐな歌詞が好きだったんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me gustaban las letras inmaduras y directas que usaban.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Their lyrics were awkward, but I liked how honest they were.

CONTENT: でも 売れるために必死になって　どんどん歌詞を売れ線にして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero solo querían vender y las cambiaron.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But, desperate for sales, they started going in a more commercial direction.

CONTENT: それが嫌になったから辞めたんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La dejé porque eso no me gustó.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I hated that. That's why I quit.

CONTENT: 辞めるときも ちょっと もめたりして...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We had a little fight about it at the time.

CONTENT: バンドそのものが 嫌になってたころ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando odiaba la música en general...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And just as I was feeling sick of the whole band thing...

CONTENT: ねえ 暇ならベースやって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si tienes tiempo, toca el bajo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey. If you've got time, will you play bass for me?

CONTENT: なんで?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why?

CONTENT: だって あたし リョウのベース 好きだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Porque me gusta cómo lo tocas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Because I love the way you play!

CONTENT: そう虹夏に言われて　もう一度 バンドやってみようかなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oír a Nijika decir eso me empujó a tocar de nuevo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When Nijika said that to me, I decided to give playing in a band another try.

CONTENT: 個性 捨てたら 死んでるのと一緒だよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Perder la personalidad es como morir.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Abandoning your uniqueness is equivalent to dying.

CONTENT: リョウさん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ryo-san?

CONTENT: だから いろいろ考えて つまんない歌詞書かないでいいから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No le des mil vueltas para escribir letras aburridas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So don't write generic lyrics based on other concerns.

CONTENT: ぼっちの好きなように書いてよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Write what you want to write.

CONTENT: け... けど そうすると 根暗で どんよりな歌詞が...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero podría quedarme una letra muy oscura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: B-But if I do that, I'll write bitter, social-outcast lyricsー

CONTENT: でも それ リア充っ子に歌わせたら 面白くない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No sería gracioso que la cantara una chica tan normalita?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But won't it be hilarious if a normie sings that?

CONTENT: 毎日1人 呪っていくね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I spend my days cursing you losers!

CONTENT: バラバラな個性が集まって ひとつの音楽になって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La unión de distintas personalidades se convierte en música.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bringing a wide variety of individuals together into one sound...

CONTENT: それが 結束バンドの色になるんだから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y eso crea el color de Kessoku Band.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's the color that Kessoku Band will have.

CONTENT: リョウさん ちゃんとした人だったんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ryo-san is actually a considerate person.

CONTENT: そろそろ出よう あっ はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's get out of here. R-Right!

CONTENT: えっ あっ リョウさん　お会計...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ryo, no has pagado la cuenta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, Ryo-san... The check...

CONTENT: ごめん 今 お金ないから おごって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry, I'm broke. Treat me?

CONTENT: えっ? で... でも　リョ... リョウさんが ここに誘ったんじゃ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero si me hiciste venir tú...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wh-What? B-But you're the one who invited me...

CONTENT: 最近 草しか食べてなくて限界で
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No podía seguir comiendo pura maleza.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just couldn't take another day of eating weeds.

CONTENT: まだ野草生活を!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're still doing that?!

CONTENT: それに この店 オープンしたばっかりだし　どうしても食べたくて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Acababan de abrir este local y quería probarlo sí o sí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And this shop just opened, and I wanted to eat here so bad...

CONTENT: お願い おごって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please, treat me?

CONTENT: ぜ... 前言撤回
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I t-take back what I said!

CONTENT: 本当に ごめん 来月返します
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te lo devolveré el mes que viene.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I really am sorry. I'll pay you back next month.

CONTENT: あっ いつでも大丈夫なので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: N-No need to rush...

CONTENT: あっ あの!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: U-Um...

CONTENT: わ... 私 頑張ります!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I'm going to try my best!

CONTENT: うん じゃあ 楽しみにしてるよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure. Can't wait to see it.

CONTENT: あっ あの...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: U-Um...

CONTENT: 歌詞 出来たんですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I f-finished the lyrics...

CONTENT: ど... どうぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: H-Here.

CONTENT: 後藤さん 目のクマ 大丈夫?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Gotoh-san, are you all right? You look tired.

CONTENT: あっ はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm fine.

CONTENT: ここのところ作詞に夢中になって その... 寝るの忘れたりして
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es que estaba obsesionada con la letra y me olvidaba de dormir.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've just been so focused on the lyrics, I c-completely forgot to sleep...

CONTENT: おおー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wow!

CONTENT: どれどれ ぼっちちゃんの力作 拝見しましょー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A ver... Veamos la obra de Bocchi.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's have a look! I can't wait to see the fruits of your labors!

CONTENT: あの く... 暗すぎるかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It m-might be... too much of a downer.

CONTENT: 確かに暗いね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It certainly is a downer.

CONTENT: リョウ先輩!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ryo-senpai!

CONTENT: でも ぼっちらしい あっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But it's very Bocchi.

CONTENT: 少ないかもしれないけど 誰かに深く刺さるんじゃないかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quizás no sea con muchos, pero resonará con algunos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It might not connect with too many people, but those it does, it'll hit deeply.

CONTENT: なんで急に 仲良くなってるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Where'd this friendship come from?!

CONTENT: でもさ この歌詞 ホントにいいよ ぼっちちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es una letra muy buena, Bocchi.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But these lyrics really are super great, Bocchi-chan!

CONTENT: あっ! 私 ここのフレーズ 好きです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A mí me gusta esta frase.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I love this phrase here!

CONTENT: 私も
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Same.

CONTENT: か... 歌詞も なんとか形になった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I m-managed to figure out the lyrics.

CONTENT: 頑張ろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going to do my best...

CONTENT: それで バンドがずっと続いて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La banda seguirá activa para siempre
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I hope the band can stay together forever...

CONTENT: これからも みんなと いろんな写真 撮っていけたらいいな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: y me tomaré muchas más fotos con ellas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and I can get lots of pictures with everyone.
